entry.title: HRAshton/shikimori-graphql-api-lightweight-client: This is typed lightweight client for GraphQL. It contains only methods and types and exports only `fetch` calls to make requests.
entry.content: This is typed lightweight client for GraphQL. It contains only methods and types and exports only `fetch` calls to make requests.

entry.content: A lightweight file-based database management system that supports CRUD operations, custom queries, and graph structures.

entry.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.
entry.content: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.

entry.title: sanakareem/taskflow: askFlow is a lightweight internal tool for managing projects and tasks. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for tracking work across multiple projects, with features like a Kanban board, task priorities, due dates, and more.
entry.content: askFlow is a lightweight internal tool for managing projects and tasks. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for tracking work across multiple projects, with features like a Kanban board, task priorities, due dates, and more.

entry.content: Vite plugin for f4, a lightweight web development framework

entry.title: iamVihanga/Bun-Hono-Advanced-Backend: A modern, lightweight backend application built with Bun and HonoJS. This project features a fully type-safe architecture, leveraging HonoJS RPCs for efficient routing, Zod for robust validation, and Drizzle ORM for seamless database interactions.
entry.content: A modern, lightweight backend application built with Bun and HonoJS. This project features a fully type-safe architecture, leveraging HonoJS RPCs for efficient routing, Zod for robust validation, and Drizzle ORM for seamless database interactions.

entry.title: Meekiavelique/mdoc: A lightweight, minimalist documentation system.
entry.content: A lightweight, minimalist documentation system.

entry.title: Jagadeeshroc/Backend-initializing-DB: This project initializes a basic Express.js server connected to a SQLite database (userDate.db). It uses the sqlite and sqlite3 packages to open the database and ensures the server listens on port 3010. Ideal for lightweight apps needing persistent local data without external DBs.
entry.content: This project initializes a basic Express.js server connected to a SQLite database (userDate.db). It uses the sqlite and sqlite3 packages to open the database and ensures the server listens on port 3010. Ideal for lightweight apps needing persistent local data without external DBs.

entry.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
entry.content: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.

entry.title: manuel-lohmus/log-report: A simple and lightweight logging library for Node.js.
entry.content: A simple and lightweight logging library for Node.js.

entry.title: gontuvamsi/task-manager: The Task Manager App is a lightweight, user-friendly web app built using React and LocalStorage. Designed as a PoC, it enables efficient daily task management with a modern, responsive UI. It highlights best practices in front-end development and UI/UX design with dynamic interactivity and persistent storage.
entry.content: The Task Manager App is a lightweight, user-friendly web app built using React and LocalStorage. Designed as a PoC, it enables efficient daily task management with a modern, responsive UI. It highlights best practices in front-end development and UI/UX design with dynamic interactivity and persistent storage.
